Jogo sensacional e leve (roda em qualquer PC), ao meu ver é bem melhor que o Portal 1 que também é excelente, te faz pensar pra poder passar nos desafios, o jogo é bem fácil no início e vai aumentando de dificuldade no decorrer, um dos melhores jogos de plataforma que já joguei, vale muito a pena.

Nota: 8.9

众所周知，Portal2发展前辈的了令人惊叹的游戏设计，并且主线剧情引人入胜，我们很难给它下一个定义。我们可以叫它“第一人称益智类游戏”

I always have, do, and certainly will love this game. For it's age and release date, it's great! Very fun, sometimes really gets you to stop and rethink your plan about completing the level. The story is obviously present, and a good follow-up to the first game. However, no cutscenes, no too much in your face bs, fully lets you focus on levels themselves if you really want to. There is also the co-op mode which gives a new set of levels, story, new characters, and fun emotes along with customization for the co-op characters. Plus there's easy access to the workshop or a simple level creator. All of these give the game a sense of good replay value and yet another reason to love it. Definitely recommend.
